members.name: TransitionEvent.propertyName
members.description: Is a DOMString containing the name CSS property associated with the transition.

members.name: TransitionEvent.elapsedTime
members.description: Is a float giving the amount of time the transtion has been running, in seconds, when this event fired. This value is not affected by the transition-delay property.

members.name: TransitionEvent.pseudoElement
members.description: Is a DOMString, starting with '::', containing the name of the pseudo-element the animation runs on. If the transition doesn't run on a pseudo-element but on the element, an empty string: ''.

members.name: TransitionEvent()
members.description: Creates a TransitionEvent event with the given parameters.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Is a DOMString representing the name of the type of the TransitionEvent. It is case-sensitive and can only be: 'transitionend'.

parameters.name: animationName Optional
parameters.description: Is a DOMString containing the value of the animation-name CSS property associated with the transition. It defaults to "".

parameters.name: elapsedTime Optional
parameters.description: Is float giving the amount of time the animation has been running, in seconds, when this event fired, excluding any time the animation was paused. For an "animationstart" event, elapsedTime is 0.0 unless there was a negative value for animation-delay, in which case the event will be fired with elapsedTime containingÂ  (-1 * delay). It defaults to 0.0.

parameters.name: pseudoElement Optional
parameters.description: Is a DOMString, starting with "::", containing the name of the pseudo-element the animation runs on. If the animation doesn't run on a pseudo-element but on the element, an empty string: "". It defaults to "".

members.name: TransitionEvent.initTransitionEvent()
members.description: Initializes a TransitionEvent created using the deprecated Document.createEvent("TransitionEvent") method.

parameters.name: typeArg
parameters.description: Is a DOMString identifying the specific type of transition event that occurred. The following value is allowed: Value Meaning transitionend The transition completed.

parameters.name: canBubbleArg
parameters.description: Is a Boolean flag indicating if the event can bubble (true) or not (false).

parameters.name: cancelableArg
parameters.description: Is a Boolean flag indicating if the event associated action can be avoided (true) or not (false).

parameters.name: transitionNameArg
parameters.description: Is a DOMString containing the name of the CSS property associated with the transition. This value is not affected by the transition-delay property.

parameters.name: elapsedTimeArg
parameters.description: Is float giving the amount of time the transition has been running, in seconds, when this event fired.
